title: Radiologist assistants; revise licensure qualifications for and authorize preliminary interpretation report with initial observations.
subject: Public Health and Welfare

actions.description: Referred To Public Health and Welfare

extras.summary: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION 41-58-7, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO REVISE LICENSURE QUALIFICATIONS FOR RADIOLOGIST ASSISTANTS; TO AUTHORIZE A RADIOLOGIST ASSISTANT TO COMMUNICATE A PRELIMINARY IMAGE INTERPRETATION REPORT WITH INITIAL OBSERVATIONS TO OTHER CARE PROVIDERS TREATING A PATIENT; TO REQUIRE THAT A RADIOLOGIST PROVIDE FINAL IMAGE INTERPRETATION; TO AUTHORIZE A RADIOLOGIST ASSISTANT TO COMMUNICATE A RADIOLOGIST'S PRELIMINARY OR FINAL IMAGE INTERPRETATION TO OTHER CARE PROVIDERS; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
